---
category: news
title: "New deep learning challenge to estimate breast density from mammograms"
excerpt: "A new deep learning challenge has been launched by the UEF Cancer AI research team at the University of eastern Finland, led by senior researcher Hamid Behravan, PhD. The challenge aims to develop an architecture capable of automatically estimating the breast percentage density from mammograms."
